img_above_text:
![Wukong Turtle 29.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/7f/Wukong_Turtle_29.jpg)
Another dangerous attack he can launch with little warning only comes with a small tell -- when he quickly swaps his sword to hold in a reverse grip behind his back. He'll then quickly launch himself through the air at you with a spinning slash that can take a chunk off your health, and then dive back to your position after a moment for sword slice when he reaches the ground.
img_below_text:
The good news is his final sword slice allows for an extended moment to dodge around and attack him from behind. However, you'll need to keep your eyes open when trying to attack from behind, as he can easily whip his mace-like tail around to hit you. Watch for it to rise up to the top left before slashing down to the bottom right to know when to deflect or evade.
![Wukong Turtle 27.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b5/Wukong_Turtle_27.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Turtle 29.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/7f/Wukong_Turtle_29.jpg)
Another dangerous attack he can launch with little warning only comes with a small tell -- when he quickly swaps his sword to hold in a reverse grip behind his back. He'll then quickly launch himself through the air at you with a spinning slash that can take a chunk off your health, and then dive back to your position after a moment for sword slice when he reaches the ground."
        - Following Text: "The good news is his final sword slice allows for an extended moment to dodge around and attack him from behind. However, you'll need to keep your eyes open when trying to attack from behind, as he can easily whip his mace-like tail around to hit you. Watch for it to rise up to the top left before slashing down to the bottom right to know when to deflect or evade.
![Wukong Turtle 27.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b5/Wukong_Turtle_27.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts an intense combat scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, featuring the player character battling a boss named "Cyan Loong." The boss is wielding a glowing sword charged with electricity, suggesting a powerful attack in progress. The snowy environment and rocky backdrop set the stage for the fight. The preceding and following text describe the boss's dangerous moves, including a spinning slash and tail whip, emphasizing the need for strategic dodging and counterattacks. The image visually complements the guide's explanation of the boss's mechanics and challenges.
